column5: hey everyone! I just wanted to take a second to introduce myself...i was a member on the old OFC and a long time lurker of the new OFC...well i decided it was time to stop creeping in the shadows and say hi haha! im a big bass fisherman, but love catching anything that will hit my lure i look forward to getting involved in some of the great conversations that get going!   Sam   oh and i know everyone likes them some fish porn, a few bass from an outing last summer
Welcome back Sam. Beauty bass there.
Hey Rankda... gotta love a lunker bass! Nice photos.
Welcome / back to OFC Sam Love the lunker pics Leechman
Hey Sam !!! looking forward to the soft water to see some more of those Bee A double S, big ole Bass. Welcome to the familly  Paul
Welcome aboard again Sam. Looking forward to the posts
those Bass almost look like they could sing "take me to the river"  welcome aboard!
thanks for the warm welcome everyone! i cant wait to fill the boards up with reports come spring/summer
